text: (Abagwa mu kiti ekyo) beebo abeenenyeza Katonda abasinza Katonda abatendereza Katonda, abatambula mu nsi ku lw'okuweereza Katonda abakutama ku maviivi ne bavunnama ku ttaka (nga basaala) abalagira e mpisa e nnungi era abaziyiza amayisa amabi, era abeekuumira ku mateeka ga Katonda, era sanyusa abakkiriza
